results.title: Prehospital Diagnosis of Shortness of Breath Caused by Profound Metformin-Associated Metabolic Acidosis
results.text_hl: We report a case of prehospital dyspnoea initially ascribed to @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011654 @@@pulmonary oedema@@@ which turned out to be the result of profound @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@-associated @DISEASE_Acidosis @DISEASE_MESH:D000138 @@@metabolic acidosis@@@.

citations.NLM: Fubini PE, Suppan L. Prehospital Diagnosis of Shortness of Breath Caused by Profound Metformin-Associated Metabolic Acidosis Healthcare (Basel). 2021 Jan 14;9(1):. PMID: 33466796
citations.BibTeX: @article{33466796, title={Prehospital Diagnosis of Shortness of Breath Caused by Profound Metformin-Associated Metabolic Acidosis}, author={Fubini PE and Suppan L}, journal={Healthcare (Basel)}, volume={9}, number={1}}

results.title: Metformin attenuates ventilator-induced lung injury
results.text_hl: Compared to no medication, pretreatment with @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ was associated with a 2.9-fold reduction in ultrafiltration coefficient, a 2.5-fold reduction in @<m>DISEASE_Pulmonary_Edema</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D011654 @@@pulmonary edema@@@ formation, lower protein concentration in BALF, lower @GENE_LOC103351595 @GENE_103351595 @@@ACE@@@ activity in BALF, and fewer histological lesions upon challenge of the lung preparation with injurious ventilation.

citations.NLM: Tsaknis G, Siempos II, Kopterides P, Maniatis NA, Magkou C, Kardara M, Panoutsou S, Kotanidou A, Roussos C, Armaganidis A. Metformin attenuates ventilator-induced lung injury Crit Care. 2012 Jul 24;16(4):R134. PMID: 22827994
citations.BibTeX: @article{22827994, title={Metformin attenuates ventilator-induced lung injury}, author={Tsaknis G and Siempos II and Kopterides P and Maniatis NA and Magkou C and Kardara M and Panoutsou S and Kotanidou A and Roussos C and Armaganidis A}, journal={Crit Care}, volume={16}, number={4}, pages={R134}}

results.title: Metformin relieves acute respiratory distress syndrome by reducing miR-138 expression.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ relieves @DISEASE_Respiratory_Distress_Syndrome @DISEASE_MESH:D012128 @@@acute respiratory distress syndrome@@@ by reducing miR-138 expression.

citations.NLM: Yu LL, Zhu M, Huang Y, Zhao YM, Wen JJ, Yang XJ, Wu P. Metformin relieves acute respiratory distress syndrome by reducing miR-138 expression. Eur Rev Med Pharmacol Sci. 2018 Aug;22(16):5355-5363. PMID: 30178862
citations.BibTeX: @article{30178862, title={Metformin relieves acute respiratory distress syndrome by reducing miR-138 expression.}, author={Yu LL and Zhu M and Huang Y and Zhao YM and Wen JJ and Yang XJ and Wu P}, journal={Eur Rev Med Pharmacol Sci}, volume={22}, number={16}, pages={5355-5363}}
